Description: Scarab as inlay: a large scarab in opaque dark-blue glass, glossy surface. Un-inscribed and not pierced. Moulded. A conventional specimen with the wings incised after moulding. Probably intended as an inlay on some piece of funerary or ceremonial equipment. Due to an advanced stage of devitrification the scarab has broken into many fragments and is now in very poor condition.
